   22: -module(mnesia2_examples_test).
   23: -author('hakan@erix.ericsson.se').
   24: -compile([export_all]).
   25: -include("mnesia2_test_lib.hrl").
   26: 
   27: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   28:     mnesia2_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   29: 
   30: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   31:     mnesia2_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   32: 
   33: -define(init(N, Config),
   34: 	mnesia2_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia2]},
   35: 					   delete_schema],
   36: 					  N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   37: 
   38: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   39: all() -> 
   40:     [bup, company, meter, {group, tpcb}].
   41: 
   42: groups() -> 
   43:     [{tpcb, [],
   44:       [replica_test, sticky_replica_test, dist_test,
   45:        conflict_test, frag_test, frag2_test, remote_test,
   46:        remote_frag2_test]}].
   47: 
   48: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   49:     Config.
   50: 
   51: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   52:     Config.
   53: 
   54: 
   55: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   56: bup(doc) -> ["Run the backup examples in bup.erl"];
   57: bup(suite) -> [];
   58: bup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   59:     Nodes = ?init(3, Config),
   60:     opt_net_load(bup),
   61:     ?match(ok, bup:test(Nodes)).
   62: 
   63: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   64: company(doc) ->
   65:     ["Run the company examples in company.erl and company_o.erl"];
   66: company(suite) -> [];
   67: company(Config) when is_list(Config) -> ok.
   68: 
   69: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   70: 
   71: replica_test(suite) -> [];
   72: replica_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   73:     ?init(3, Config),
   74:     opt_net_load(mnesia2_tpcb),
   75:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia2_tpcb:start(config(replica_test, ram_copies))).
   76: 
   77: sticky_replica_test(suite) -> [];
   78: sticky_replica_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   79:     ?init(3, Config),
   80:     opt_net_load(mnesia2_tpcb),
   81:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia2_tpcb:start(config(sticky_replica_test, ram_copies))).
   82: 
   83: dist_test(suite) -> [];
   84: dist_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   85:     ?init(3, [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(10)} | Config]),
   86:     opt_net_load(mnesia2_tpcb),
   87:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia2_tpcb:start(config(dist_test, ram_copies))).
   88: 
   89: conflict_test(suite) -> [];
   90: conflict_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   91:     ?init(3, Config),
   92:     opt_net_load(mnesia2_tpcb),
   93:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia2_tpcb:start(config(conflict_test, ram_copies))).
   94: 
   95: frag_test(suite) -> [];
   96: frag_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   97:     ?init(3, Config),
   98:     opt_net_load(mnesia2_tpcb),
   99:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia2_tpcb:start(config(frag_test, ram_copies))).
  100: 
  101: frag2_test(suite) -> [];
  102: frag2_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  103:     ?init(3, Config),
  104:     opt_net_load(mnesia2_tpcb),
  105:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia2_tpcb:start(config(frag2_test, ram_copies))).
  106: 
  107: remote_test(suite) -> [];
  108: remote_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  109:     ?init(3, Config),
  110:     opt_net_load(mnesia2_tpcb),
  111:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia2_tpcb:start(config(remote_test, ram_copies))).
  112: 
  113: remote_frag2_test(suite) -> [];
  114: remote_frag2_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  115:     ?init(3, Config),
  116:     opt_net_load(mnesia2_tpcb),
  117:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia2_tpcb:start(config(remote_frag2_test, ram_copies))).
  118: 
  119: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  120: meter(doc) ->
  121:     ["Run the meter example in mnesia2_meter.erl"];
  122: meter(suite) ->
  123:     [];
  124: meter(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  125:     [N | _] = ?init(3, Config),
  126:     opt_net_load(mnesia2_meter),
  127:     ?match(ok, mnesia2_meter:go(ram_copies, [N])).
  128: 
  129: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  130: 
  131: config(Test, Type) ->
  132:     Config0 = mnesia2_tpcb:config(Test, Type),
  133:     %% Cut the times, the idea is to test the example and configuration
  134:     %% not running the test a long time
  135:     Config1 = lists:keyreplace(stop_after, 1, Config0, {stop_after, 6000}),
  136:     lists:keyreplace(report_interval, 1, Config1, {report_interval, 1000}).
  137: 
  138: opt_net_load(ExampleMod) ->
  139:     opt_net_load([node() | nodes()], ExampleMod, ok).
  140: 
  141: opt_net_load([Node | Nodes], ExampleMod, Res) ->
  142:     case rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, opt_load, [ExampleMod]) of
  143: 	{module, ExampleMod} ->
  144: 	    opt_net_load(Nodes, ExampleMod, Res);
  145: 	{error, Reason} ->
  146: 	    Error = {opt_net_load, ExampleMod, Node, Reason},
  147: 	    opt_net_load(Nodes, ExampleMod, {error, Error});
  148: 	{badrpc, Reason} ->
  149: 	    Error = {opt_net_load, ExampleMod, Node, Reason},
  150: 	    opt_net_load(Nodes, ExampleMod, {error, Error})
  151:     end;
  152: opt_net_load([], _ExampleMod, Res) ->
  153:     Res.
  154: 
  155: opt_load(Mod) ->
  156:     case code:is_loaded(Mod) of
  157: 	{file, _} ->
  158: 	    {module, Mod};
  159: 	false ->
  160: 	    Abs = filename:join([code:lib_dir(mnesia2), examples, Mod]),
  161: 	    code:load_abs(Abs)
  162:     end.
